name: TVT
description: tvt is a smart contract token on Ethereum platform. Tvt is used for Reward for contributor who broadcast Tvt Messages on a best effort.The tvt token encourage tvt message broadcast. Tvt aims to be the most Well-know token in the world.Tvt is a strong focus on best effort tvt token spread and tvt message broadcast .A low cost is very important, we will adjust this cost and get better benefits.when transactions in tvt token are faster & cost less per transaction fee it becoming more popular & getting more adoption .
